snippet.title: Tom Cruise settles defamation lawsuit against tabloid publisher
snippet.description:
* Actor Tom Cruise has settled a $50 million defamation suit he filed last year against a tabloid publisher after it ran stories accusing him of having "abandoned" his daughter Suri during his divorce from her mother, actress Katie Holmes.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/21/showbiz/tom-cruise-suri-defamation/index.html

snippet.title: Tom Cruise: "Nunca abandoné a Suri"
snippet.description:
* Los Ángeles (CNN) — Tom Cruise defendió su relación con su hija Suri, al negar que se sintió “abandonada” el verano pasado cuando se divorció de su madre, la actriz Katie Holmes. La declaración jurada de Cruise fue presentada en la corte federal como...

snippet.title: Tom Cruise: I never 'abandoned' Suri
snippet.description:
